protocol.text: Plants were treated at the onset of the light period on day 15 with 5 mM KNO3 or 5 mM KCl as control for 2 hours. Roots were cut and frozen on liquid nitrogen.

Arabidopsis seedlings of the Col 0 and tga1/tga4 genotypes were grown on hydroponic medium containing 1X MS salts without Nitrogen, supplemented with 0.5 mM ammonium succinate as Nitrogen source and 3 mM sucrose on a Percival chamber under a photoperiod of 16 hours of light (100 μE/m2/sec) and 8 hours of dark at 22�C for 14 days.
Total RNA was extracted using the TriZol reagent as indicated by the manufacturer.
Bioitinylated cRNA was prepared using the GeneChip 3'IVT kit from Affymetrix
ATH1 chips were hybridized using the GeneChip Hybridization, Wash and Stain kit from Affymetrix
Chips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G and the Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console Scan Control 1.1.0.845 software

The summarized probe set data was generated using R/bioconductor (affy library). Normalization of the data was performed using rma. Normalized data was subjected to a two-way ANOVA analysis with a false discovery rate of 5 %.
